Which festival is held in December in the Turkish city of Konya?

What was the on-time performance for Pegasus for September?
Pegasus' on-time performance for September was 92.67%. Still proud to be the first company in Turkey to publish such stats online!
To which Middle Eastern cities is Pegasus now flying?
New routes: Erbil 4 times/week, direct frm Ankara, conn Istanbul & Izmir. Tehran, 3 times/week. From $99, incl taxes. http://t.co/TTshHB2h
